name: Pioneer Pied Piper
description:
This game was made for the Mini Jam 60: Crime.

Play as a devious cattle rustler who can hypnotize cattle with only a whistle, and make them follow behind him! 

Collect the minimum amount of cattle each level then escape into your wagon! 

Outwit and outrun enemies by using your thief reflexes or blocking them with a wall of cattle!

Controls:

- WASD / Arrow : Move

- Space: Activate thieve's reflexes where enemies only move when you do

- R: Reset
